summary.span: 表示有关如何在 Windows 7 任务栏缩略图中显示按钮的信息。

span.span: Represents information about how to display a button in the Windows 7 taskbar thumbnail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]任务栏提供了增强的功能，使您能够使用任务栏按钮来传达给用户的状态，并且最小化或隐藏窗口时公开常见任务。The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality that enables you to use the taskbar button to communicate status to a user and expose common tasks when the window is minimized or hidden. 可以将按钮添加到任务栏缩略图，而无需切换到应用程序窗口中提供的常见任务的访问权限。You can add buttons to the taskbar thumbnail to provide access to common tasks without switching to the application window. 例如，Windows Media Player 提供了可用于应用程序最小化时控制媒体的播放从任务栏缩略图的播放、 暂停、 转发和后按钮。For example, Windows Media Player provides Play, Pause, Forward, and Back buttons that you can use to control media playback from the taskbar thumbnail when the application is minimized. 类包含描述的属性如何[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]shell 任务栏缩略图中显示的按钮。The class contains properties that describe how the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] shell displays the buttons in the taskbar thumbnail. 它提供本机 Windows API 的托管的包装。It provides a managed wrapper around the native Windows API. 对象包含在集合。 objects are contained in the collection. 增强的任务栏功能不可用以前的 Windows 版本中比[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。The enhanced taskbar functionality is not available in versions of Windows earlier than [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]. 在[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]，某些功能可能不可用，具体取决于用户的设置。In [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)], some functionality might not be available depending on the user's settings. 例如，按钮，才会显示在任务栏缩略图中时[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)]已启用。For example, buttons are only shown in the taskbar thumbnail when [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aero](~/includes/tlasharptla-aero-md.md)] is enabled. 你的应用程序应提供与用户交互的其他不依赖于增强的任务栏功能的方法。Your application should provide alternate ways of interacting with the user that are not dependent on the enhanced taskbar functionality. 下图显示任务栏预览，带有两个提供访问的播放和停止命令的拇指按钮。The following illustration shows a taskbar preview with two thumb buttons that provide access to the Play and Stop commands. ![任务栏项目信息示例](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "任务栏项目信息示例")![Taskbar Item Info Sample](~/add/media/wpfshell-taskbariteminfo.png "Taskbar Item Info Sample") Windows 任务栏缩略图按钮Windows Taskbar Thumb Buttons ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建标记中。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 包含一系列提供从任务栏项访问的播放和停止命令的对象。The contains a collection of objects that provide access to the Play and Stop commands from the taskbar item. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#010](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#010)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果处理事件，事件处理程序执行而不是任何绑定到缩略图按钮。If you handle the event, the event handler executes instead of any that is bound to the thumbnail button.

span.span: Gets or sets the command to invoke when this thumbnail button is clicked.

span.span: The command to invoke when this thumbnail button is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果处理事件，事件处理程序执行而不是任何绑定到缩略图按钮。If you handle the event, the event handler executes instead of any that is bound to the thumbnail button. 在 XAML 中，此属性通常设置为静态命令值从一个现有命令库，如从或库。In XAML, this property is often set to be a static command value from one of the existing command libraries, such as from the or library. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建标记中。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 绑定到命令。The is bound to the command. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置要为缩略图按钮工具提示显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to display for the thumbnail button tooltip.

value.span: 要为缩略图按钮工具提示显示的文本。

span.span: The text to display for the thumbnail button tooltip.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将图像添加到缩略图按钮，但不存在的属性用于在缩略图按钮表面上设置的文本。You can add an image to a thumbnail button, but no property exists for setting text on the thumbnail button face. 但是，可以设置属性添加当鼠标指针移动到缩略图按钮工具提示中显示的说明性文本。However, you can set the property to add descriptive text that is displayed in a tooltip when the mouse pointer moves over the thumbnail button. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建标记中。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 绑定到命令。The is bound to the command. 工具提示的描述性文本长度**停止**。The tooltip descriptive text is **Stop**. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#020](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#020)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击缩略图按钮时任务栏缩略图是否关闭。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the taskbar thumbnail closes when the thumbnail button is clicked.

value.span: 如果缩略图关闭，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the thumbnail closes; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，任务栏缩略图保持可见，单击缩略图按钮时。By default, the taskbar thumbnail remains visible when a thumbnail button is clicked. 若要使缩略图关闭，在单击缩略图按钮时，设置属性设置为`true`。To make the thumbnail close when a thumbnail button is clicked, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建标记中。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 绑定到命令。The is bound to the command. 它被配置为关闭时单击该按钮。It is configured to close when the button is clicked. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#020](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#020)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在缩略图按钮上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the thumbnail button.

value.span: 在缩略图按钮上显示的图像。

span.span: The image that is displayed on the thumbnail button.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将一个静态或动态显示缩略图按钮上。You can place a static or animated on the thumbnail button. 图像呈现按适当的大小。The images are rendered at the appropriate size. 如果表示，也使用适当的位深度。If the represents an , the appropriate bit depth is also used. 若要提供其他有关缩略图按钮的文本信息，请设置属性。To provide additional textual information about the thumbnail button, set the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建标记中。The following example shows how to create a in markup. 绑定到命令。The is bound to the command. 按钮图像是作为静态资源的 XAML 中定义的暗灰色方框。The button image is a dark gray square defined in XAML as a static resource. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-xaml[Shell_TaskbarItemSample#020](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_taskbaritemsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#020)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在缩略图按钮周围是否突出显示边框。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a border and highlight is displayed around the thumbnail button.

value.span: 如果在缩略图按钮周围突出显示边框，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a border and highlight is displayed around the thumbnail button; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，由边框周围将显示，并突出显示当鼠标指针移到缩略图按钮上。By default, a border appears around the , and a highlight is displayed when the mouse pointer is moved over the thumbnail button. 若要仅显示如果没有边框和突出显示中，设置属性设置为`false`。To display only the without the border and highlight, set the property to `false`. 如果是`false`，则仍切换何时缩略图按钮被单击以向用户提供可视反馈。If is `false`, the still shifts when the thumbnail button is clicked to provide visual feedback to the user.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以与缩略图按钮进行交互。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can interact with the thumbnail button.

value.span: 如果用户可以与缩略图按钮进行交互，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can interact with the thumbnail button; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`false`，缩略图按钮不响应事件。When the property is `false`, the thumbnail button does not respond to events. 但是，未变暗。However, the is not dimmed. 可以使用不是交互状态图标为一个缩略图按钮。You can use a thumbnail button that is not interactive as a status icon. 如果属性是`false`，则设置为不产生任何影响。If the property is `false`, the setting for does not have any effect.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定缩略图按钮的显示状态。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the display state of the thumbnail button.

value.span: 一个枚举值，该值指定缩略图按钮的显示状态。

span.span: An enumeration value that specifies the display state of the thumbnail button.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，缩略图按钮是。By default, the thumbnail button is . [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] 在任务栏缩略图中允许最多七个按钮。 allows a maximum of seven buttons in the taskbar thumbnail. 当属性设置为，缩略图按钮不包含任何可见的元素，但空间仍为其保留。When the property is set to , the thumbnail button has no visible elements, but space is still reserved for it. 缩略图按钮时、 不具有任何可见的元素和它不保留任何空间。When the thumbnail button is , it does not have any visible elements and no space is reserved for it. 在这种情况下，其他缩略图按钮集合会显示。In this case, additional thumbnail buttons in the collection are displayed.
